name: Turkey and Swiss Wrap
steps: Lay the tortilla flat on a clean surface.
Spread mayonnaise and mustard evenly over the tortilla.
Layer turkey slices, Swiss cheese, and lettuce in the center.
Fold in the sides of the tortilla, then roll it tightly into a wrap.
Slice in half and serve immediately.

name: Creamy Butternut Squash Soup
steps: Peel and cube the butternut squash.
In a large pot, sauté diced onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add the squash and vegetable broth, then bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the squash is tender.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in cream and a pinch of nutmeg, then season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with a drizzle of cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps
steps: In a bowl, mix tuna, mayonnaise, diced celery, and a splash of lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon the tuna salad onto large lettuce leaves.
Wrap the lettuce around the tuna mixture to form a wrap.
Serve immediately or chill before serving.

name: Vegetarian Lentil Curry
steps: Rinse lentils under cold water until the water runs clear.
In a large pot, sauté diced onions in oil until golden brown.
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute to release the aroma.
Stir in chopped tomatoes, lentils, and coconut milk.
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper, then garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

name: BLT Sandwich
steps: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy, then drain on paper towels.
Toast bread slices until golden brown.
Spread mayonnaise on one side of each slice of bread.
Layer lettuce, tomato slices, and bacon on one slice of bread.
Top with the second slice of bread and press gently.
Cut in half and serve immediately.
